languages.text: Получив в свои руки инструменты массового уничтожения, Инквизитор объявил крестовый поход против многочисленных ересей Простора. Не считаясь с потерями и не щадя ни малейшего греха, он огнем и мечом очищал регион от скверны, привлекая под свои знамена тысячи фанатиков. Когда век Инквизитора ван Калокса подошел к концу, он оставил после себя огромную свиту аколитов. Один из них принял пост своего наставника, когда тот пал в боях с неизвестными ксеносами на галактическом юге Простора.

After laying his hands on the instruments of mass destruction, the Inquisitor announced a crusade against the many heresies of the Expanse. With no regard for the lives lost and no mercy for the smallest of offences, he purged the region with fire and sword, uniting thousands of fanatics under his banner. When Inquisitor van Calox's time came to an end, he left behind a massive retinue of acolytes. One of them assumed his mentor's mantle when the Inquisitor fell fighting unknown xenos in the galactic south of the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Получив в свои руки инструменты массового уничтожения, Инквизитор объявил крестовый поход против многочисленных ересей Простора. Не считаясь с потерями и не щадя ни малейшего греха, он огнем и мечом очищал регион от скверны, привлекая под свои знамена тысячи фанатиков. Когда век Инквизитора ван Калокса подошел к концу, он оставил после себя огромную свиту аколитов. Один из них принял пост своего наставника, когда тот пал в боях с неизвестными ксеносами на галактическом юге Простора.

traits.locale_text: After he got his hand on the tools of mass destruction, the Inquisitor announced a crusade against many heresies of the Expanse. With no regard for lives lost, and without any mercy for the smallest of sins, he purged the region from corruption with fire and sword and attracted thousands of fanatics under his banner. When the time of the Inquisitor van Calox came to an end, he left behind a massive retinue of acolytes. One of them took on his mentor's mantle when the Inquisitor fell fighting some unknown xenos on the galactic south of the Expanse.

After he got his hand on the tools of mass destruction, the Inquisitor announced a crusade against many heresies of the Expanse. With no regard for lives lost, and without any mercy for the smallest of sins, he purged the region from corruption with fire and sword and attracted thousands of fanatics under his banner. When the time of the Inquisitor van Calox came to an end, he left behind a massive retinue of acolytes. One of them took on his mentor's mantle when the Inquisitor fell fighting some unknown xenos on the galactic south of the Expanse.

After laying his hands on the instruments of mass destruction, the Inquisitor announced a crusade against the many heresies of the Expanse. With no regard for the lives lost and no mercy for the smallest of offences, he purged the region with fire and sword, uniting thousands of fanatics under his banner. When Inquisitor van Calox's time came to an end, he left behind a massive retinue of acolytes. One of them assumed his mentor's mantle when the Inquisitor fell fighting unknown xenos in the galactic south of the Expanse.

languages.text: 冯·卡洛克斯审判官拥有了大规模杀伤性武器之后，他发起了一场圣战，讨伐科罗努斯扩区内的诸多异端。他不计牺牲，绝不姑息任何罪行，以烈火与利剑净化了整个扩区，成千上万的狂热信徒集结在他的旗帜之下。当冯·卡洛克斯审判官的时代迎来终结时，他留下了一支规模庞大的侍仆队伍。当他在扩区南部与未知异形的战斗中身亡时，其中一名侍仆继承了他的衣钵。
languages.original_text: After laying his hands on the instruments of mass destruction, the Inquisitor announced a crusade against the many heresies of the Expanse. With no regard for the lives lost and no mercy for the smallest of offences, he purged the region with fire and sword, uniting thousands of fanatics under his banner. When Inquisitor van Calox's time came to an end, he left behind a massive retinue of acolytes. One of them assumed his mentor's mantle when the Inquisitor fell fighting unknown xenos in the galactic south of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 冯·卡洛克斯审判官拥有了大规模杀伤性武器之后，他发起了一场圣战，讨伐科罗努斯扩区内的诸多异端。他不计牺牲，绝不姑息，以烈火与利剑净化了整个扩区，成千上万的狂热信徒集结在他的旗帜之下。当冯·卡洛克斯审判官的时代迎来终结时，他留下了一支规模庞大的侍仆队伍。当他在扩区南部与未知异形的战斗中身亡时，其中一名侍仆继承了他的衣钵。

languages.text: Nachdem ihm Werkzeuge der Massenvernichtung in die Hände gefallen waren, rief der Inquisitor einen Kreuzzug gegen die vielen Ketzereien der Ausdehnung aus. Ohne Rücksicht auf die verlorenen Leben und ohne Gnade selbst für kleinste Vergehen säuberte er die Region mit Feuer und Schwert und vereinte Tausende von Fanatikern unter seinem Banner. Als die Zeit von Inquisitor van Calox ihr Ende fand, hinterließ er ein gewaltiges Gefolge von Akolythen. Einer von ihnen übernahm die Rolle des Mentors, als der Inquisitor im galaktischen Süden der Ausdehnung im Kampf gegen unbekannte Xenos fiel.
languages.original_text: After laying his hands on the instruments of mass destruction, the Inquisitor announced a crusade against the many heresies of the Expanse. With no regard for the lives lost and no mercy for the smallest of offences, he purged the region with fire and sword, uniting thousands of fanatics under his banner. When Inquisitor van Calox's time came to an end, he left behind a massive retinue of acolytes. One of them assumed his mentor's mantle when the Inquisitor fell fighting unknown xenos in the galactic south of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem ihm Werkzeuge der Massenvernichtung in die Hände gefallen waren, rief der Inquisitor einen Kreuzzug gegen viele Ketzereien der Ausdehnung aus. Ohne Rücksicht auf die verlorenen Leben und ohne Gnade selbst für kleinste Vergehen säuberte er die Region mit Feuer und Schwert und vereinte Tausende von Fanatikern unter seinem Banner. Als die Zeit von Inquisitor van Calox ihr Ende fand, hinterließ er ein gewaltiges Gefolge von Akolythen. Einer von ihnen übernahm die Rolle des Mentors, als der Inquisitor im galaktischen Süden der Ausdehnung im Kampf gegen unbekannte Xenos fiel.

languages.text: Après avoir mis la main sur des instruments de destruction massive, l'inquisiteur décréta une croisade contre les nombreuses hérésies des Étendues. Sans égard pour les vies perdues et impitoyable envers le moindre crime, il rassembla des milliers de fanatiques sous sa bannière et purifia tout le secteur par le feu et l'épée. Quand son heure sonna, l'inquisiteur van Calox laissa derrière lui une importante cohorte d'acolytes et c'est l'un d'eux qui reprit son flambeau lorsqu'il succomba face à des xénos inconnus dans le sud galactique des Étendues.
languages.original_text: After laying his hands on the instruments of mass destruction, the Inquisitor announced a crusade against the many heresies of the Expanse. With no regard for the lives lost and no mercy for the smallest of offences, he purged the region with fire and sword, uniting thousands of fanatics under his banner. When Inquisitor van Calox's time came to an end, he left behind a massive retinue of acolytes. One of them assumed his mentor's mantle when the Inquisitor fell fighting unknown xenos in the galactic south of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir mis la main sur des instruments de destruction massive, l'inquisiteur décréta une croisade contre les nombreuses hérésies des Étendues. Sans égard pour les vies perdues et impitoyable envers la moindre transgression, il rassembla des milliers de fanatiques sous sa bannière et purifia tout le secteur par le feu et l'épée. Quand son heure sonna, l'inquisiteur van Calox laissa derrière lui une importante cohorte d'acolytes et c'est l'un d'eux qui reprit son flambeau lorsqu'il succomba face à des xénos inconnus dans le sud galactique des Étendues.

languages.text: Una vez se hizo con sus instrumentos de destrucción masiva, el Inquisidor anunció una cruzada contra las numerosas herejías de la Extensión. Sin preocuparse por las vidas perdidas ni apiadarse de las más mínimas transgresiones, purgó la región a fuego y acero, uniendo a miles de fanáticos bajo su estandarte. Cuando la era del Inquisidor van Calox llegó a su fin, dejó tras él un enorme séquito de acólitos. Uno de ellos tomó el manto de su mentor cuando el Inquisidor cayó ante unos xenos desconocidos en el sur galáctico de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: After laying his hands on the instruments of mass destruction, the Inquisitor announced a crusade against the many heresies of the Expanse. With no regard for the lives lost and no mercy for the smallest of offences, he purged the region with fire and sword, uniting thousands of fanatics under his banner. When Inquisitor van Calox's time came to an end, he left behind a massive retinue of acolytes. One of them assumed his mentor's mantle when the Inquisitor fell fighting unknown xenos in the galactic south of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Una vez se hizo con sus instrumentos de destrucción masiva, el Inquisidor anunció una cruzada contra las numerosas herejías de la Extensión. Sin preocuparse por las vidas perdidas ni apiadarse de las más mínimas transgresiones, purgó la región a fuego y acero, uniendo a miles de fanáticos bajo su estandarte. Cuando la era del Inquisidor van Calox llegó a su fin, dejó tras él un enorme séquito de acólitos. Uno de ellos tomó el manto de su mentor cuando el Inquisidor cayó ante unos xenos desconocidos en el sur galáctico de la Extensión.

languages.text: 大量破壊装置を手にした異端審問官は、エクスパンスにはびこる異端者たちに聖戦を布告した。失われた命を一顧だにせず、些細な罪にも容赦せず、炎と剣の粛清を一帯に浴びせかける審問官。その旗の下には幾千の狂信者が寄り集った。異端審問官ヴァン・カロックスの時代が終焉を迎えると、後にはアコライトの巨大な一団が残された。エクスパンスの銀河南で異端審問官が未知なる異種族との闘いに殉じると、一団から指導者の威光を引き継ぐ者が現れた。
languages.original_text: After laying his hands on the instruments of mass destruction, the Inquisitor announced a crusade against the many heresies of the Expanse. With no regard for the lives lost and no mercy for the smallest of offences, he purged the region with fire and sword, uniting thousands of fanatics under his banner. When Inquisitor van Calox's time came to an end, he left behind a massive retinue of acolytes. One of them assumed his mentor's mantle when the Inquisitor fell fighting unknown xenos in the galactic south of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 大量破壊装置を手にした異端審問官は、エクスパンスにはびこる異端者たちに聖戦を布告した。失われた命を一顧だにせず、どれほど小さな罪にも容赦なく、炎と剣の粛清を一帯に浴びせかける審問官。その旗の下には幾千の狂信者が寄り集った。異端審問官ヴァン・カロックスの時代が終焉を迎えると、後にはアコライトの巨大な一団が残された。エクスパンスの銀河南で異端審問官が未知なるゼノとの闘いに殉じると、一団から指導者の威光を引き継ぐ者が現れた。

languages.text: Eline kitle imha araçları geçen Engizisyoncu, Enginlik'teki sayısız kâfirliğe karşı bir din savaşı başlattı. Sancağının altında binlerce fanatik toplayarak, kaybedilen yaşamları önemsemeden ve en küçük suçlara dâhi taviz göstermeden, bölgeyi ateşle ve kılıçla arındırdı. Engizisyoncu van Calox vadesi dolduğunda, arkasında devasa bir havari maiyeti bırakmıştı. Engizisyoncu, Enginlik'in galaktik güneyinde bilinmeyen zenolara karşı savaşırken öldüğünde, yönderlerinin vazifesini içlerinden biri devam ettirdi.
languages.original_text: After laying his hands on the instruments of mass destruction, the Inquisitor announced a crusade against the many heresies of the Expanse. With no regard for the lives lost and no mercy for the smallest of offences, he purged the region with fire and sword, uniting thousands of fanatics under his banner. When Inquisitor van Calox's time came to an end, he left behind a massive retinue of acolytes. One of them assumed his mentor's mantle when the Inquisitor fell fighting unknown xenos in the galactic south of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Eline kitle imha araçları geçen Engizisyoncu, Enginlik'teki sayısız kâfirliğe karşı bir din savaşı başlattı. Sancağının altında binlerce fanatik toplayarak, kaybedilen yaşamları önemsemeden ve en küçük suçlara dâhi taviz göstermeden, bölgeyi ateşle ve kılıçla arındırdı. Engizisyoncu van Calox vadesi dolduğunda, arkasında devasa bir havari maiyeti bırakmıştı. Engizisyoncu, Enginlik'in galaktik güneyinde bilinmeyen zenolara karşı savaşırken öldüğünde, yönderlerinin vazifesini içlerinden biri devam ettirdi.
